title: Successful Authentication for Each User Role
description: Verify that users from all roles (Admin, Teacher, Parent, Student, Accountant, Librarian, Manager) can authenticate successfully using Clerk and complete onboarding.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid credentials for a specific user role.
Complete any required onboarding steps for the role.
Verify user is authenticated and directed to the correct role-based dashboard.

title: Role-Based Dashboard Access Control
description: Ensure that each authenticated user sees dashboard elements and features corresponding only to their role without leakage of other roles' data.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Verify Admin dashboard loads with Admin features only.
Logout and login as Teacher.
Verify Teacher dashboard loads with Teacher features only.
Repeat for Parent, Student, Accountant, Librarian, and Manager roles.
Verify dashboard data isolation between all roles.

title: Create and Manage Halaqa Sessions
description: Verify Teachers can create, modify, and delete Halaqa sessions accurately.

steps.description: Login as Teacher.
Navigate to Halaqa management page.
Create a new Halaqa session with valid data.
Verify the new Halaqa session appears in the session list with correct details.
Modify the Halaqa session details.
Verify changes are saved and displayed correctly.
Delete the Halaqa session.
Verify the session is removed from the list.

title: Attendance Tracking Accuracy and Edge Cases
description: Validate that Teachers can record attendance, handle absent and excused statuses, and view accurate attendance reports.

steps.description: Login as Teacher.
Navigate to attendance page for a specific Halaqa session.
Mark attendance for all students as present.
Verify the attendance is saved and reflected correctly.
Mark some students as absent and excused.
Confirm attendance report accurately reflects all statuses.
Attempt to mark attendance outside session dates.
Verify system prevents invalid attendance recording.

title: Assignment Creation, Submission, and Progress Tracking
description: Verify Teachers can assign homework, Students can view and complete assignments, and Parents can monitor progress; system tracks progress accurately.

steps.description: Login as Teacher and create an assignment for a Halaqa session.
Verify assignment is listed in Teacher's dashboard.
Login as Student and check for new assignment.
Verify assignment details are correct and accessible.
Complete and submit the assignment.
Verify the submission is recorded.
Login as Parent to view child's assignment status and progress.
Check that progress is displayed accurately.

title: Financial Management: Billing and Payments Processing
description: Validate that Accountants can create billing records, view payments, manage salaries and expenses and reports display correct financial data.

steps.description: Login as Accountant.
Create a billing invoice for a student or parent.
Verify invoice is generated with correct details.
Record payment against the invoice.
Verify payment status updates accordingly.
Manage staff salary entries.
Confirm salary details and payments are recorded.
Register school expenses.
Verify expenses appear correctly in financial reports.
View financial analytics dashboards.
Check charts and analytics represent accurate financial data.

title: Real-time Messaging and Notifications Delivery
description: Test that messages and notifications are sent and received in real-time between users across all applicable roles.

steps.description: Login as Teacher and send a message to a Parent.
Login as Parent and verify message receipt instantly.
Ensure notification is received immediately on message arrival.
Send system notification from Admin role.
Verify notification appears on all users' dashboards in real-time.

title: Transport Management: Route and Driver Updates
description: Verify that transport coordinators can add, edit, delete routes and drivers and track vehicle status with live updates.

steps.description: Login as Transport Coordinator.
Add a new transport route and assign a driver.
Confirm new route and driver appear correctly in the system.
Update vehicle status during route.
Verify status updates reflect instantly in dashboard.
Delete an existing route and verify it's removed.
Confirm associated driver and status records are handled correctly.

title: Library Management: Inventory and Loan Status
description: Confirm librarians can add, update, and track library inventory, manage loans and view accurate usage statistics.

steps.description: Login as Librarian.
Add new books into library inventory.
Verify new books are listed with correct details.
Issue a loan to a student and record return date.
Confirm loan status updates correctly in the catalog.
View usage statistics dashboard.
Ensure statistics reflect current loans and inventory status accurately.

title: UI Responsiveness and RTL Language Support Across Devices
description: Test the application UI displays correctly in RTL languages (Arabic, Somali) with full responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Set application language to Arabic.
Verify text alignment, layout, and navigation adapt properly for RTL.
Resize viewport across desktop, tablet, and mobile dimensions.
Confirm UI elements resize and rearrange correctly without overlap or clipping.
Repeat steps for Somali language setting.

title: Gamification Features Tracking and Leaderboard Updates
description: Validate that student activities correctly earn points, badges, and streaks; leaderboard updates reflect changes accurately in real-time.

steps.description: Login as Student and complete various engagement activities.
Verify points and badges are awarded correctly.
Maintain daily login streak.
Confirm streak count increments accurately.
Login as Teacher or Admin and view leaderboard.
Ensure leaderboard ranks students correctly with up-to-date scores.

title: Error Handling: Invalid Inputs on Academic Management Modules
description: Verify that invalid data inputs in class creation, attendance marking, and assignment creation are handled gracefully with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt to create a class with missing required fields.
Verify error messages are displayed and creation is blocked.
Try submitting attendance using invalid student IDs.
Check system rejects input and alerts user.
Submit an assignment with incomplete or invalid details.
Confirm form validation prevents submission and notifies user.

title: Security: Access Denial for Unauthorized Dashboard Features
description: Confirm users attempting to access features or data outside their permissions are denied access with proper error or redirect.

steps.description: Login as Student.
Attempt to access Admin-only financial reports.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected or shown an error.
Login as Parent and try to edit teacher-specific Halaqa sessions.
Confirm no unauthorized modifications are allowed.
